title: "Медиакоролева Путина": Симоньян попросила "не кормить ее тщеславие"
cleaned_sentences: "Mediakoroleva Putin": Simonyan asked "not to feed her vanity" The editor -in -chief of Russia Today Margarita Simonyan said that the Western media “feed her vanity” with their epithets.
She wrote about this in her Telegram channel.
Simonyan drew attention to the article by Newsweek under the heading of Putin Mediakoroleva boasts “secret projects” in the United States in a pop -up video.
” The article is about Simonyan and the “whole empire of secret projects” aimed at the formation of public opinion in the West regarding the Ukrainian crisis.
Newsweek noted that in July, US authorities warned Americans about the “threat of Russian propaganda” on the eve of the November presidential elections.
Experts of the Director of National Intelligence Director called Russia "the main threat of elections."
““ Mediakoroleva Putin ”is strong :) Comrades of the bourgeois, stop feeding my vanity with your fast food.
It gets fat - then put him on a diet! "
- So Simonyan commented on the article (spelling and punctuation of the author are preserved).
